stories.text:
Do you think:

- people will migrate back to on-prem / dedicated / colo hosting to reduce cloud costs?

- do you believe companies will spend less on online advertising?

- do you believe tech compensation will change somehow (more salary comp and less stock comp, given that stock is way down)

etc...

What's your prediction?
